modName: Shenmi 2.0 with a quest for Vanilla and Requiem
summary: Standalone custom follower with unique summon spells and a quest to make her more powerful.
descriptionHtml:
Shenmi is a standalone, HD head mesh follower with custom summon spells that conjure unique new creatures. She has a no script quest where you need to help her find hidden items that her uncle placed around Skyrim. Each new item you find for her will allow her to summon a new and more powerful creature. Simply find the items and give them to her. You start the search by taking her journal from her inventory and reading it for the first clue. Her journal also gives you her background story.

Some of her creatures actually emit light when their flame cloak is active! You can see it in the video. The creatures are all from my mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80086/?]Crater of Exile[/url] and if you have it installed, say YES to overwrite when installing this mod. The same goes if you install the Crater of Exile after Shenmi. The shared files are exactly the same. I did this so Shenmi does not require the other mod.

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url] [color=#ffff00]version is available![/color][/size][color=#dbb0a7][size=5][size=3]
Shenmi is fully HDT ready with CBBE body.[/size][/size][/color]

[size=4][u][color=#ffff00][b]Check out the video![/b][/color][/u][/size]

[youtube]JgtPl2Ybidk[/youtube]

[u][size=5][color=#cc4125]This file requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn or you will CTD!
You can play this mod without a skeleton, but if you use any follower mod to manage gear you will need a skeleton like [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url] or you will CTD![/color][/size][/u]

There is no quest script, I instead used a journal in her inventory and notes to give you hints to the locations of each item. (These will be posted in a sticky so they can be copied and dropped into a translator.)

Shenmi can be found wandering from the Riverwood bridge up to the first bandit tower on the trail to Bleak Falls Barrow. At night she will be enjoying herself in The Sleeping Giant Inn. She starts at level 3 with her own dagger, bow and one spell. She does not have any of the Vanilla spells. She will level with the player.

She is marriageable and has a custom sandbox package that is a good bit larger so she can roam around more when you let her.

She has many perks in Conjuration, Light Armor and Archery. She also has the Light Foot perk to not set off pressure plates.

And in case you don't like the war paint, there is an optional texture file to remove it. Check the images to see her without it.


[color=#00ffff][size=3][b]Please scroll through the images to see some great shots from friends that know far more about screen archery then do I.
[/b][/size][/color]
A beautiful shot from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3656968/?]noisepulse[/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/ZEPiLC][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4573/37851592664_51f7ec5fa5_z.jpg[/img][/url]

And another from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/14844589/?]ZwabberdieBo[/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/21L9nPP][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4573/38568252681_d8e31fbfd7_z.jpg[/img][/url]
[color=#dbb0a7][size=5][size=3]
[color=#ffffff][size=2]There is no quest script. The four scripts are on Shenmi's items and only run when she equips/unequips the items.
Cleaned with TES5Edit.
NMM installation.
[/size][/color][/size][/size][/color][size=2]She is wearing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60195/?]Merta Assassin Armor[/url] in some of the images.
